item.title: ps_supplierlist - Configure Settings
item.description: ps_supplierlist - Configure Settings Details Status : Automated Automated on : 9.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-7274 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/modules/34_ps_supplierlist/01_configure/01_configureSettings.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO> Modules> Module Manager Module Manager page is well displayed Search supplierlist module Supplier list module is displayed in Design & Navigation result Click on Configure module button Configure / Supplier list page is well displayed Edit type of display, save. The settings have been updated.
